Html:
Hello , is there any way to show scale in staticimage , like in paper maps , ie 1:12000 ,

i found solution here http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa940990.aspx

but i dont know how to get  "ScreenRes pixels/inch"

i am using windows forms.

pls help me.

Thank you very much for your reply.

from 'scale' i mean  "1 inch in map translates to 12000 inch on ground".

The function "GetGroundResolution" will give resolution in meter/pixel.

if we get  screen resolution in pixel/meter ,then scale can be shown. but how to get

screen resolution. Hope i conveyed you properly.

My aim is to take print of map with proper scale.
